website_summaries.verdict: Award-winning antivirus software that provides important levels of protection on multiple devices.
pros: Offers a user-friendly password management system that keeps your passcodes secure yet accessible when you need them
Provides reliable protection as you browse the internet, and added protection for important files
cons: Installation can be challenging, and customer service could be more attentive

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have always used mcafee but after today never again the code kept giving me error i called the tech support and they wete trying to scam me put of 200 for an additional fire wall on my laptop and when i told them i didnt want to pay that they said i couldn't even get a refund that i had to pay 200 for the firewall in order to install in the antivirus in my laptop. Scam and waste of money.zero stars should be an option
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Arzate

customer_reviews.title: I'm a bit disappointed. I do understand they are a good product
customer_reviews.text: One day after I bought it, after hours trying to install it, I called McAfee and asked for their cash back guarantee. I was told they would send me a check (really? I paid via debit card). It's been two weeks now and nothing. I'm a bit disappointed. I do understand they are a good product, just really poor service.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: So easy.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using McAfee for almost 20 years and never (knock on wood) had a virus since. Problem is, it's just too expensive to buy through them. Unless you call or get on chat, they'll come down but if you don't have time for that this is the best. Buy it, go to your media here on Amazon copy the code, click link and if you're already a customer of McAfee you're signed in and off and running. Couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa FFC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better deal than auto renewing with the macafee app!
customer_reviews.author: Nividia009

customer_reviews.title: Amazon will not assist us. We lost our money
customer_reviews.text: While visiting my 94 year old uncle we found he was having computer issues. To assist our elderly uncle I purchased the Mc Afee Total protection with a download feature. The download from McAfee did not work. We called the McAfee customer support number. Customer support asked permission to go into the computer remotely to try to resolve the download problem. They were not able to download the software and suggested we had a network security problem that they would gladly fix for $250. I contacted Amazon for a refund, as the product is unusable. Amazon denied us a refund saying it is the responsibility of McAfee. However we paid Amazon Shame on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: A scam that worked in the end
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't install so I called 888-996-0392 the # that came up with the error code. I talked to a rep (about 40 minutes) who explained I had a trojan invasion, had been hacked by a foreign entity and needed a fire wall for $898; after saying that was too much he had a deal of 3 year coverage for $300. After he got angry with me for not buying, I hung up. I called 866-622-3911 the next day and talked to a legitimate tech who after an hour finally got the product installed. How can scammers exist on Amazon products? Beware!! McAffee?
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Zee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work...
customer_reviews.text: I've used McAfee for over 10 years but for some unknown reason, this software could not complete a full scan on my PC. I checked my PC worked with McAfee for 3 days. There was no solution that they could see. So... I wouldn't buy it but if it works for you, go for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keedee

customer_reviews.title: I am sure the product is fine but it wiped out the registry that is needed ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Norton as this was a bit cheaper and did I pay dearly. I am sure the product is fine but it wiped out the registry that is needed for Microsoft Office. I have Office 2010, if you have the same just beware as it took me 6+ hours over three days with Microsoft tech support to get Office back up. I don't mind wasting the $20 or so but cant get back those 6 hours. May not be an issue for you but it was for me. .
customer_reviews.author: MAD

customer_reviews.title: Don't  do it.
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible time with this product, I had to call Amazon various times to obtain the activation code , then it didn't work . I called Macafee they tried to scam me into buy a more expensive product... Amazon said not refunds for this item. I ended up just loosing my money with this purchase. Instead I purchased Norton and its working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily
customer_reviews.text: McAfee seems to be a good virus protection app, as are many others. But they are often a pain to install, especially if you have virus protection from another year. I had last year’s version and McAfee posted a pop up message when it was going to expire. Their offer was a lot more expensive to renew than this one on Amazon. AndI usually prefer Amazon anyway because they stand behind their products. I did have to delete the old version, but thisnew version automatically took care of the bits and pieces lying around and updated to this new version. It was probably the easiest to install yet.
customer_reviews.author: PT Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommended from a savvy computer user.  I have ZERO virus' or malware.
customer_reviews.text: I ran a scan after using this for one month and I had ZERO issues identified. Then I downloaded Malwarebytes to make sure, and it came up with nothing. I consider myself a savvy computer user, and never has my computer been so clean with any other software. On a Dell , windows 10, with 16 GB ram and an i5 processor I can't tell that it is running. While I write this, it is using less than 1% CPU and 100 mb memory or less. I researched the reviews online and this was rated the best. I got it for a great price here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Installed effortlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Sooo much cheaper than buying the software conventionally, from a department store or tech store. Advertises three devices, and easily installed on all three (even reminded me how many I had left to install). I have windows 10, and the application performs flawlessly on my pc's. I've used McAfee for years; good reliability. I would NOT recommend checking the box that allows for auto-renewal payment, as then you can't shop around for a better price (like I did here). I mistakenly did this in the past, but McAfee made it right & refunded my money (good customer service).
customer_reviews.author: Coondog71

customer_reviews.title: I lost $27
customer_reviews.text: I spend half a day to install this download. I try 3 times and always it get stuck on 83% of installation, and couldn't finish thru 6 hours. I was very reluctant to purchase because of bad reviews, but I did and I cannot regret more. Number which is given on instruction is a bogus number with adds only. I'm very disappointed that Amazon is selling this crab, $ 27 is not a fortune, but who wants to give it for nothing?
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna Walter

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful Awful Awful!Once I downloaded the software I have had nothing but problems with my computer. After hours and hours of trying to find the problem and hours and hours in the phone with McAfee we are worse off from where we began and now I can not even use my computer so they now want me to pay one off their technicians to fix the problem that their software created. Do Not Buy This!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Auto Renew not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've been using total protection for many years with no problems. One star deducted because they push the auto renew on you. I tried that once several years back and was auto billed list price (the price with the "X" in it on Amazon). I called and complained about being charged full and they did knock quite a bit off. But from now on I don't use Auto renew and annually just shop around for the best price which saves a bundle.
customer_reviews.author: F. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Easy install for Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th year of buying McAfee through Amazon. Saved probably $40 per year. A couple of suggestions over the years on the install- take a photo of your 25 digit activation code, and WAIT 15 minutes before proceeding to activation. In the past I would immediately run through the activation and had problems. Last two years the activation was seamless....so easy to just follow prompts. Don’t forget, once installed to go back into your McAfee account and turn off the auto renew feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: McAfee tech support is a scam.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased McAfee protection plan. Received code and entered it as instructed. Error code came up which prompted us to call the number provided for tech support. We did as instructed and they told us it would be $500 to repair our working computer and add on McAfee plan. We refused and they immediately decreased the price to $200 then again to $70. We refused this scam and purchased another antivirus program and we are out our money as amazon does not take this product back. Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Macafee anti virus software is a scam
customer_reviews.text: The link issued by amazon did to work. I was forced to use the McAfee customer service department and as part of that technical support had to give LogMeIn(r) access to a total stranger. In addition, the technician was not employed by McAfee, but a contract service. The technician was unfriendly but competent. He started the download. The process to begin the download required fifteen minutes. Once I completed the download/installation, the software ran a scan and then required me to purchase additional features for a monthly fee to continue. DO NOT BUY THIS SOFTWARE.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't download
customer_reviews.text: Despite having the correct operating system I get an error code stating I don't have the correct operating system. Tried tech support but I kept getting dropped and never completed the call. Tech support stated that the they recently updated and that was why I couldn't download......I will never order from McAfee again! I asked for a refund but got dropped and disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Eats your resources and does what McAFee wants!  Not you!
customer_reviews.text: Gobbles resources and can set things up the way McAfee wants it more than you! There has got to be a better product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to instal on Mac. A bit more complicated (unnecessarily) on Windows. Be sure to switch off auto renew or McAfee will blast your credit card for $70 when your subscription expires. The best deal is on Amazon for instant download. Have had Mcafee for 5 years and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: John Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Easy Download
customer_reviews.text: This is the third year I purchased McAfee antivirus software at $25 rather than renewing the program directly with McAfee for $80. I haven't had any issues with my PC or cell phones (where the software is installed) in all this time. It's hard to know whether the program has stopped any major infections or hacks, but I'm happy with the product and it is easy to download and install the program from McAfee's website.
customer_reviews.author: kevind

customer_reviews.title: Froze My Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that the McAfee, once installed, slowed by laptop to a crawl, forcing me to backup my files to a flash drive before doing a system restore which removed the McAfee and restored my laptop to operational condition. I am now afraid to install the McAfee on any three devices. Is this McAfee compatible with Windows 10 Home? I am not sure what sank this ship.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Imakyure

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product and McAfee customer service is very helpful with installation of the product. The price is better than buying from McAfee directly.
customer_reviews.author: Richele Lewis-Reece

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to install this product on my computer and it directed me to there 800 number and I spoke to there customer service representative and was told I needed my computer repaired for a 149.99 in order for virus protection to be installed. I bought Norton and had no issue putting it on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell if it works.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if it really does anything. Internet fearmongering pressured me to buy antivirus, so I got this. Might just be an umbrella on a sunny day, as it never detects any viruses. It scans, or says it scans, and it updates itself. But it's anyone's guess if it works or not. But I don't want to really test it either...so meh. So I'll keep buying if I don't get viruses, but I can't give more than a "meh" review if I can't tell if it works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Pax

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Software
customer_reviews.text: Would not download on my computer, NO HELP FROM CUST SERVICE, terrible experience, Some guy from India that I could not understand hung up on me, now impossible to get money back from Amazon, going to reverse charges on the Card
customer_reviews.author: #1BearsFan

customer_reviews.title: Will not work for Mac OSX 10.11.1 (El Capitan)
customer_reviews.text: Despite the Mcafee website stating this software is compatible with Mac OSX 10.8 and above- this is not true. According to Mcafee tech support it must be 10.12 and above. After spending an hour on the phone with tech support and another 45 minutes with customer service to try to issue a refund, I am disgusted. Thanks for wasting my time and money. Oh did I mention it will take three weeks to get my refund? Never again.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: I regret installing Macafee
customer_reviews.text: I regret installing Macafee. My quiet life of working on my laptop, is now interrupted by Macafee pop up ads to enable, purchase, or read about some of there products. Even after turning off ALL notifications, I still get pop ups. I will be shopping for a different Antivirus, the product should have a selection for me to turn off ALL notifications that I do not want. Hate this program.
customer_reviews.author: David Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good security software
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty with the activation. Once you put in the activation code you thought a download would take place, but now you are directed to a McAfee tech that goes into your computer to make a lot of changes. Then of course there is an error message. Now, you are directed to another company which has the software to correct the problem at additional cost. This is not very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I have a very common virus, akamaihd.net. The one that hijacks your search engine. Been around forever. McAfee couldn’t find it. Seriously? A well known, common virus? McAfee just peddles scareware. It took 4 tries before I could even get it to run a full scan without crapping out like some 80 year old wheezing to the finish line. Thanks for wasting $18 and 3 hours of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Electron

customer_reviews.title: McAfee AV
customer_reviews.text: The program itself is cool, even when it is doing a task in the background the system still functions like nothing is even going on. It is a fully functional program. I had more problems getting it to accept my password than anything because apparently I had this program sometime back and the password in Memory was still active. Other than that it is a great AV program
customer_reviews.author: spirithand

customer_reviews.title: Leading software...
customer_reviews.text: Norton's technical support is based in India... That is disturbing, I know this from 1st hand experience and the sad part Is that their representative did not even know Norton software or TCP/IP and how it functions (e.g. CIDR) NEVER NORTON AGAIN and they promote they have USA based technical support. Choose your AV software wisely. McAfee is preferred by Governmental Agencies and trusted by more businesses. I have seen only a few that are ore preferred like TOTAL AV... Chose wisely!!!! McAfee seems to be the better choice.
customer_reviews.author: furious in AL

customer_reviews.title: McAFEE IS STILL A USELESS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: D0N'T DO IT!!! This thing is useless. It can't even kill it's main competitor, Norton, which is what I wanted. It does nothing else either. So NORTON WINS AGAIN!!! I have no choice but to go back to them and that's that. Also, trying to get a refund is almost impossible. I hope Amazon will help me here. . .
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I always buy McAfee. It's easy to install the download. I do have one suggestion for the buyer. When you copy and paste your key# have your locked caps on your key board off. this will prevent you from starting your download as it wont recognize your key code . once you have the upper case key off. you can copy and paste your code easily.. It's pretty simple..
customer_reviews.author: MichelleMyBell

customer_reviews.title: I feel secure
customer_reviews.text: McAfee Total Protection was easy to install. I immediately ran its "SCAN" to check my computer. It found two problems and corrected them. I have been getting a lot of ransomware attacks and McAfee has stopped that. I look at their report and I see a number of bad sites blocked each day. I had used McAfee before but it was using a lot of my resources. This new version does not. It has not affected my computer speed, at least noticeably.
customer_reviews.author: Two Texans

customer_reviews.title: Not all that straight forward to install
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to figure out how to install this software without the benefit of having a disc. The portal on the Mcaffee website is buried in one of the drop down menus. Once I was able to get to the right menu it went pretty quickly. It does take about 30 minutes to do the complete installation but once done it is up and running fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul 1946

customer_reviews.title: Slight glitch on installation
customer_reviews.text: I have used McAfee for years and love the fact they you can buy one program to cover several devices. I usually don't have a problem with installation, we still have 2 PC's in the house. My problem this time was my Android phone. I eventually installed it successfully by going to Play Store ( it recognized my phone). The download links did not work for me even after several tries.
customer_reviews.author: Chris54

customer_reviews.title: Will destroy your mac airbook
customer_reviews.text: loaded the product down and it loaded. I did a shutdown on my mac airbook. when i tried to come back up it woud not load the operating system. When I called Mcafee they were of little help. They refered me to technical service who wanted to charge me 130 dollars for some help. I told them where to stick it. I reloaded the operating system after deleting the hard drive. So now I am fine. Beware anyone who buys this. You get what you pay for. It could lock up your mac and the folks at McaFee will be of no help. It is junk and I am out the money I spent
customer_reviews.author: Harry D Kasavich

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for Norton
customer_reviews.text: I used Norton for years but the prices kept going up, it felt increasingly intrusive and it didn't work on my Chromebook. Mcafee has proven to be a great solution. I have it on a PC, android phone and a chromebook. It does the job without being annoying and constantly trying to sell upgrades. Glad I made the change.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money on virus protection
customer_reviews.text: I've used McAfee for years and it has kept me protected "knock on wood" for all those years. The loading process took awhile for both my wifes and my computers and I'm not sure why. Pain in the butt!! But in the end it loaded and is protecting us again for another year. McAfee is in my opinion the best virus software on the market.
customer_reviews.author: FOS123

customer_reviews.title: Trash!!! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Install fails and says to call customer support. From there you'll get a rude tech with a heavy accent try to convince you to spend $200 to get it working. No idea how it actually works add I couldn't get past the install. Should have read the reviews first as I'm not the only person reporting this same issue. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The software is very easy to install, the scan for the first time takes sometime, few of hours but eventually can be done. then you have a peace of mind, the only thing not sure is the existing McAfee, I am not sure if it could be removed automatically or idled or overlap running. Overall, it is a very good and money worth protection software
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: It gets better and easier every year!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using McAfee Total Protection for at least 4 years and it gets easier to install and offers great protection against viruses.
customer_reviews.author: pattybee

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I just paid $140 to have malware removed from my computer. This software did nothing to protect my computer. When I contacted McAfee unfortunately I only speak "English" and I could not understand the person that was supposed to helping me. I ended up taking my computer to my local computer shop who informed my computer was infected.
customer_reviews.author: rdejkb

customer_reviews.title: TOO MANY SCAM SITES
customer_reviews.text: Scam me on loading software, wanted $ 300.00 to clean my system to load code. I'M still trying to load software, even the correct web site does not have path for code. Watch for fake McAfee sites.. they do not have A in name, lower case.
customer_reviews.author: paul brown

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded on pc with windows 10 and MacBook Pro with erase. Then ran the updates and full scan. Running well on both machines and seems to be protecting as well.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: The best protection
customer_reviews.text: I have been using McAfee total Protection for several years. Since I have a laptop and a desktop I always get the one for three devices. It works great, is very easy to install and I know I don't have to worry about getting a virus on my devices. I totally trust McAfee and will continue to purchase there product every year.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Franks

customer_reviews.title: Great price for all you get
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on $20 deal and well worth it. Tired of paying full price, this was a steal. Been using for several years ad no issues and fully protected my laptop so great program.
customer_reviews.author: cytherea

customer_reviews.title: Won't recommend it unless purchase from McAfee official website
customer_reviews.text: Upon putting the code into my computer, I contacted the seller's tech support due to a message indicating there's problems with downloading it into my computer. The tech took 30 min to check then said someone had hecked into my computer and wanted me to purchase a $150 "Network Protection" software to fix. And if I don't purchase it, then I will lose the $24.99 that I already paid for to download. Fortunately, when I contacted Amazon Customers Services who's very helpful in setting up a refund for the digital download and advices to make purchase from McAfee official website in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is great value! As we all know with threat of some deviants out there it is necessary to have protection for your device. This was a great value for a great product! It was slightly difficult to find where to go to get the code, but 100% worth it. I will probably buy this product every time I need to renew through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I think it is good
customer_reviews.text: I have had the product for 2 months. No major disruptions, although I did install a tune up program yesterday that comes with a malware cleaner, it picked up 10 malwares hidden in my computer. Do you your job Mcafee! Although maybe Mcafee's scanning capabilities are limited?
customer_reviews.author: Hignuff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to download and to activate
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people are having issues installing it.. As soon as I place the order I received the code... I went into my account of McAfee and went to renew and paste the code... That's it.. It reactivated my antivirus and scan to make any necessary upgrade...
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: There was an issue installing this, and it will not install. The tech wants to do a process in my computer and charge me more. I can't get my money back and I don't have use of the product. Never will do this again.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: It did not work
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, however this is only the second year I have attempted to download the software. This has been a nightmare. The product code does not work and until this "review" area I have had no way to let anyone know of my problem. I am no longer going to download software. I will purchase the item with a "key" and hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible
customer_reviews.text: I've spent the best part of the day trying to install McAfee on my Windows 7 desktop PC, to no avail. When it didn't go beyond giving me a serial number, I tried to contact their service number. The recording referred me to the website and then hung up. The web site referred me to their chat, which stalled out with a blank page for hours and then closed. There is no navigation in their website so you can't go back to a previous page. All you can do is to start the same process over again with the same results. I doubt that I can get a refund. Don't get started with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Virus Protection... Just don't buy from McAfee
customer_reviews.text: I have been a user for several years and never encountered a problem on my PC. It works a little clunky on other devices. Don't renew with McAfee as they will charge up to 6x more than anywhere else come renewal time. Otherwise, you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: JohnS

customer_reviews.title: My McAfee
customer_reviews.text: My McAfee subscription ended last week. The renewal notice I got was for $99.00. I didn't want to pay that so I checked on AmazonSmile and found a much better price. I purchased the software, downloaded it and WA-LA! I'm back being protected and the price was unbeatable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Msleo

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Total Protection?
customer_reviews.text: I down loaded on two devices so far, my laptop and IPhone. Navigating to the different functions are not clear. Trying to start your ant spam protection you need a PHD. I'm disappointed with this version, I've used MacAfee in the past. a subscription with my cable provider was must simpler and easier to navigate. my mobile device app continues to shut down web protection for some reason, I not sure if it even works. I wish I could get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Total Ripoff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got activation key and found out that you are forced to use a third party to activate, and all they want is to sell you services or have them do the install for more $$$. FUBAR! Also, can't cancel this with Amazon. More FUBAR
customer_reviews.author: Cranky

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great support from mcafee and amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using mcafee for about 5 year and I will say that it has been the best antivirus I have ever used, and the best thing is the price way cheaper than any other store or Mcafee website. Also I don’t have to wait for it to get here, I can install it as soon as I buy it from amazon website. No need to wait for a cd to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Torres

customer_reviews.title: Total AV will send you a false expiration notice!
customer_reviews.text: Today I got a notice stating that my McAfee antivirus was expired and needed to be renewed. Since I was already disappointed with it, I purchased Norton instead. When I went to install Norton, McAfee informed me that I actually had a current subscription. I looked at my subscription, and found that I had only purchased the McAfee product five months before. Since I already had paid for the new Norton antvirus, I just went ahead and deleted McAfee. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Option316

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike very much. I purchased this for a chromebook and the activation code wasn't accepted, it did not work! Called McAfee support and they were no help. Called Amazon and requested refund and at first they said no, but then they agreed to give me refund since it doesn't work on my chromebook, still waiting for refund to show up on my credit card, still being charged. Be careful, dont fall for this, DON'T BUY IT! Forced to give one star since Amazon dont allow no stars.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase this Product as a Download
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT AS A DOWNLOAD FROM AMAZON. I purchased this product to save around $40; but after trying for 4 hours to download and install it, I wish I had paid the additional money to purchase it directly from McAfee. I will never purchase software from Amazon again. It only takes one bad item to spoil the entire ordering experience. Don't purchase this software download from Amazon. I think they should leave the software to other vendors.
customer_reviews.author: C in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: The product would not download and gave me a message to call McAff. Called tech support and they tried to sell me a lot of additional help for a product that cost. Small amount of money. I called to get a refund but got fromMcafee and got a horrible agent that would not listen to my problems. The amazon website was inadequate to stop the purchase. I bought a different and better product this morning. Boo,,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: John Francis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and the price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for me. My HP laptop came with a free trial of McAfee Livesafe already installed, which I renewed and kept for the next year, even though I didn't need the type of protection it offers. This Total Protection version was a great price, less than half of what I would have had to pay to get it directly from McAfee. It was easy to install, too; took about two hours but I think that was because it had to uninstall the Livesafe first. The only thing I had to do was restart the computer once it was finished, I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: cheaper to buy than renew
customer_reviews.text: i’ve had mcafee total for a couple of years and my only complaint is they charge full price for auto renew, so i’m forced to buy and install it again for whatever the going rate is...this time auto renewal was $69 and i bought this for $19
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the innstallation is a little bit tricky
customer_reviews.text: got it installed in three devices and running all ok, Mac and windows, the installation is a little bit tricky, need to be patient
customer_reviews.author: varoosh

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor. I should have read the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Tried more than 3 hours and 18 tries to download and install. Always got an error message. Should have read the reviews where many others experienced the same trouble. 21.34 wasted. Ended up going to the web site and buying it for the exact price and had NO problems. I should have read!
customer_reviews.author: Loves iPads

customer_reviews.title: Bullet Proof
customer_reviews.text: I've been using McAfee for years on all my devices without any disruptions, incursions or virus attacks. It always warns about where your browser shouldn't be going and buying it on Amazon saves some bucks so its all good and very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Will not install; it may be  scam
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this software instead of renewing my currently installed McAfee because if the higher renewal fee, but the software will not install and directed me to contact MacFee tech support for help. To make a long story short, they tried to sell me a $499 package for life time support and claimed I could not install the software because my computer has been hacked, and they would only be able to help me if I were to purchase one of the packages. Mysteriously, I went to McAfee website and downloaded a 30-day trial of the same software without any issues. I SMELL A SCAM!! This is a $20 lesson.
customer_reviews.author: A. Karizat

customer_reviews.title: Total Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: While buying my Pixelbook, I was recommended this service on the amazon page. You know how before you pay for something, you get recommended other products to add on to the main product. Then after I paid for it and entered my product key, it tells me that it's not compatible with my Pixelbook. Add on the fact that its non refundable and I involuntarily donated to McAfee.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Bannerman

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I managed to install protection to PC and laptop with WinXP and Win10 accordingly. In both cases I did not have any trouble during installation. It was fast and painless.
customer_reviews.author: Taras D.

customer_reviews.title: Not supported on a Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This should be disclosed before offering to buy together when purchasing a Chromebook. No one has gotten back to me, the customer service absolutely is 0/10
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Anti Virus
customer_reviews.text: It installed very EASILY on our desk tops but we are having an issue getting it to load on the lap top...will continue to TRY...no clue why...but VERY EASY INSTALLATION ON THE DESK TOPS...I'm HAPPY cuz I have a desk top.
customer_reviews.author: shirley o

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this product, it said my activation code was invalid. I called support and they proceeded to tell me that I needed an extra firewall (for a brand new computer), which was another $150 or $300 dollars. When I said this was a brand new computer and this didn't sound right, he hung up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste
customer_reviews.text: Ran full scans and didn't find my malware. Nothing came up when searching their support site for my problem. Malwarebytes had it fixed in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my computer
customer_reviews.text: The system didn't work on my computer. It never got past the point of checking my computer. Had McAfee before and it worked good. This time it would not download. I was disappointed. Should refund my money. Sorry about the review.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of Money, I can't download the anti virus, and received some phone calls from the technician, like a fraud. and insisting to buy another plan to get firewall protection. no option to refund my money. give me back my money.....
customer_reviews.author: Almira

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I could not install it since I have Windows 7. I am very disappointed. They wanted to sell me Windows 10 for $191. I declined. If I put some more to that I could get a new laptop with Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy this to help the kids home schooling computer run more efficiently. IActivated online with code and received an error. I chatted with tech support for help. I had two different reps call me and take over my computer. After after the second one talked to me about my compromised IP address he tried to sell me a 5 year subscription for $329.00. I declined and ask that he get off of my computer remotely and now my computer has been stuck on this screen for over 30 minutes. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble with my computer, was very slow and had annoying pop ups that I just could not get rid of. Bought the McAfee Total Protection, was very easy to download. I scanned my computer and found two virus possible trojans and McAfee was unable to fix them. I called Tech Support who was very kind and patient listen to all my complaints spent the time with me and cleaned up all unnecessary files on my computer, remove the virus/trojans and now my computer is running smooth, quickly, like when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: software defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this software and as soon as I installed it my computer crashed and had to take computer to shop to be cleaned of all viruses and malware. Computer repairman said software was probably defective. I really should get a refund for this purchase. Very dissatisfied and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: linda musser

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't download this software because of some remnant of McAfee Enterprise hidden away on my computer. searches for this remnant came up blank rendering the software useless.
customer_reviews.author: tonermd

customer_reviews.title: Not the full version & only lasted me 5 months
customer_reviews.text: It only lasts 5 months and it's not the full version.
customer_reviews.author: Logan skeen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install/download and operate. I feel confident my electronics are protected from criminals and thugs. It scans and informs me daily. Nice to know it’s there.
customer_reviews.author: FlaBuyer57

customer_reviews.title: Would not install on my Windows XP server.
customer_reviews.text: Of course they had already uninstalled my old anti virus software. The 'fix' tool downloaded from their support site also failed to work. I installed TotalAV which worked just fine without any hassles.
customer_reviews.author: darkmatter

customer_reviews.title: Failed McAfee code from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The code offered at the link failed to download in either of my two computers & McAfee has installed a different code/s to them instead & charged my account as well. Please consider me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Vanar

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't seem to protect from malware at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have win 10 on an hp laptop, and on a flashcard drive, I used to get constant notices about the drive having a problem. I got a new card, and now the same error is showing up for that one. I'm sure this is a malware issue.
customer_reviews.author: artistpw

customer_reviews.title: just get it cheap
customer_reviews.text: the only good thing is you buy it cheap if you find it cheap I don't care how it works or what it does but you need to have it, so I don't have any issues with my computer nock on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Easy Renewal
customer_reviews.text: Iq purchased McAfee Total Protection through Amazon for the past three years. The download code worked easily. McAfee recognized it as a renewal to the existing coverage. No problems encountered. I'm happy and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: mejiro-san

customer_reviews.title: Good quality protection at a good price
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a long time since I have had to buy this but it was a great price and so simple! Amazon makes it so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rocamontes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install & Use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. It was super easy to use activate and install. I had a different version of McAfee on my computer that came free with the laptop and this new software automatically detected and removed it so that I had an easy install. Didn’t take super long to install and seems to keep me protected. No issues here.
customer_reviews.author: AKWshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste you money, no support and no refund when it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought the computer for a friend then purchased true protection but couldn’t get it to work. Even after contacting them, nothing! Wanted a refund didn’t get that either.
customer_reviews.author: WearJesusWell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - excellent price
customer_reviews.text: You can either buy this here at a reasonable price and type in the code (3 minutes of your time - max) or you can use the auto-renewal in the company’s product for an exorbitant price. I went with the 1st option and am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Last year I installed McAfee without any difficulty. This year it was a nightmare and after 2 attempts I gave up. I will never purchase a McAfee product again.
customer_reviews.author: dikran bairamian

customer_reviews.title: could not download
customer_reviews.text: put in authentification code product would not load called tech support they tried to charge me 300 dollars for extra services cant see paying 300 dollars to get 23 dollar software to work I now understand why Amazon sold it with no exchange or returns. I will not purchase software from Mcafee or Amazon anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Software Download Came Quickly, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: The download link came quickly and was easy to install. I had no need to contact seller for any support. Installed software on 2 laptops so far and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: James Zank

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: At first it seem hard to install. But did not know I had to uninstall the old one in order to install the new one After that it was easy. Hood deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: viveca kenner

customer_reviews.title: Required AOI Tech Solutions to install
customer_reviews.text: MacAfee tech support transferred me to this group. They said that MacAfee protected my computer but not my router and that I needed their additional support to completely be protected. It cost me an additional $99.95.
customer_reviews.author: Marin Reader

product_meta.title: McAfee Total Protection 2020, 3 Device Antivirus Internet Security Software, Password Manager, Privacy, 1 Year - Download Code
product_meta.description: Platform:Download Code| Edition:3 DevicesMcAfee Total Protection is the one-stop shop for digital protection, with award-winning cloud-based antivirus, intelligent web protection and cross-device compatibility to protect computers & mobile devices.
feature_bullets: AWARD-WINNING ANTIVIRUS SOFTWARE: Defend against viruses and online threats with a combination of cloud-based and offline protection for your privacy, identity and your devices

SECURE BROWSING WITH CONTROLS: Sidestep cyber and malware attacks before they happen with clear warnings of risky websites, links and files. Help your connected kids build good digital habits with Safe Family parental controls
PASSWORD MANAGER: Enjoy secure and convenient access to all your logins with a browser-based password manager that generates and memorizes secure passwords for you
FILE LOCK: Place your sensitive files under lock-and-key quickly and easily with 256-bit file encryption for added security
FREE SUPPORT: Get free customer support via phone, chat or online with your annual subscription
INSTANT CODE DOWNLOAD: Digital code will be emailed to you after purchase

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
